content.title: Funding
content.paragraph: Here at Mogul Management we specialize in business consulting. Our specialists take pride in assisting our clients further their portfolio by helping with their business and personal credit profile to obtain maximum funding for their future and current endeavors. Our funding team has helped thousands of investors improve their portfolio by getting them access to additional funds needed for their projects. We walk you through an easy and simple process to get you started and have funding that starts at 0% APR anywhere from 6-18 months. Please click an icon to the right that fits your needs to get started today. We look forward to working with you!
list: 0% interest rate for 6-18 months (may vary based credit)
Funding under 35k+ = 11.99%. Funding over 35k = 9.99% (Ex. Client funding for $50k would be invoiced $4,995.00)
